page.title: 14Television Viewing, Wootton.
page.content: From our questionnaire to parents and friends of the school we found that the most popular kinds of programme were drama and "soap operas". Sport was the second most popular ,followed by nature programmes and American crime series. The television is on for an average of five and a quarter hours every day. Although we sometimes enjoy programmes on television it may be bad for our eyes and we do not learn very much from it. There is a lot of boring stuff on. It also stops us getting outside so much and there is a lot of sex and violence shown which is probably bad for us.
